objectives: Students will discuss work and career using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Romance themed scenarios related to work and career
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining work and career content with Romance narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore work and career through a Romance lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a romantic encounter or relationship development involving work and career

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to work and career in a romance context
Students engage in romance themed role-play about work and career using expert register
Students create original romance themed content about work and career in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe work and career in a Romance scenario?
What heart or passion might be involved in work and career?
Can you create a Romance story about work and career?
How does work and career change when viewed through a Romance perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this romance scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Romance situation involving work and career
roles: Character A: Using expert register in romance context
Character B: Responding in expert register within romance theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Romance theme: Love, relationships, emotional connections

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Romance themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
